plot outline: Lahari (Soundarya), daughter of a millionaire, Mahendra (Prakash Raj) falls in love with her car driver Balaji (J. D. Chakravarthy). Lahari announces her love towards Balaji in her birthday party. Mahendra and Balaji don't want her to marry Balaji as he is poor. They make an agreement; Lahari is to stay in Balaji's small house with his big family. Mahendra comes to know that Balaji also loves Lahari, but he refuses because he is poor. Finally, Balaji agrees to marry Lahari.
title: Premaku Swagatam
plot: Mahendra, a multimillionaire businessman, chooses a wealthy young man for his daughter, Lahari. However, she insists on getting married to her boyfriend, a mere car driver.

Lahari (Soundarya), daughter of a millionaire, Mahendra (Prakash Raj) falls in love with her car driver Balaji (J. D. Chakravarthy). Lahari announces her love towards Balaji in her birthday party. Mahendra and Balaji don't want her to marry Balaji as he is poor. They make an agreement; Lahari is to stay in Balaji's small house with his big family. Mahendra comes to know that Balaji also loves Lahari, but he refuses because he is poor. Finally, Balaji agrees to marry Lahari.
